io.atomix - package io.atomix
Core Atomix APIs, including AtomixClient and AtomixReplica.
io.atomix.collections - package io.atomix.collections
Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap DistributedMultiMap, DistributedQueue, and DistributedSet.
io.atomix.coordination - package io.atomix.coordination
Provides distributed coordination resources such as DistributedLock and DistributedLeaderElection, and DistributedMembershipGroup.
io.atomix.messaging - package io.atomix.messaging
Provides distributed messaging resources such as DistributedMessageBus for unreliable messaging, DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging, and DistributedTaskQueue for asynchronous processing.
io.atomix.resource - package io.atomix.resource
Provides classes and interfaces for creating and operating on Raft replicated state machines.
io.atomix.variables - package io.atomix.variables
Provides distributed variables such as DistributedValue and DistributedLong.
